title: Week In Politics: U.S. Policy On Islamic State, 2016 Presidential Race
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel speaks with regular political commentators E.J. Dionne of the Washington Post and Brookings Institution and Ramesh Ponnuru of the National Review about U.S. policy on the self-declared Islamic State and the 2016 presidential race.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
